front.title: HTTP Transport for Trusted Execution Environment Provisioning: Agent-to- TAM Communication

abstract.t: The Open Trust Protocol (OTrP) is used to manage code and configuration data in a Trusted Execution Environment (TEE). This document specifies the HTTP transport for OTrP communication where a Trusted Application Manager (TAM) service is used to manage TEEs in devices that can initiate communication to the TAM. An implementation of this document can (if desired) run outside of any TEE, but interacts with an OTrP implementation that runs inside a TEE.
